item.description: Paper Overview Calvin is a transaction scheduling and data replication layer that uses a deterministic ordering guarantee which reduces the cost associated with distributed transactions to a level that makes them feasible to run at large scale.
Paper ![[metastable-failures-1.png]] Abstract & Intro Metastable failures: A blackswan event, outliers, no foreshocks, severe impact, much easier to explain in hindsight than to predict.
Overview Zookeeper is a foundational system that enables distributed systems and workloads by providing a kernel to develop complex coordination primitives.
